intro: Piriqueta assurensis, commonly known as the Assurances piriqueta, is a rare and endemic plant species native to a specific region in southern Europe. It is characterized by its compact, shrub-like growth habit and features small, narrow leaves with a dark green hue. The plant produces clusters of tiny, white or pale yellow flowers during the spring season. It thrives in well-drained, calcareous soils and requires a sunny to partially shaded environment. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species requiring conservation efforts.
